text: dataset Input dataset. shape NxT, N number observations T dimensionality dataset. min_cov add min_frac add k_interval add metric add random_state add columns List columns selected dataset. specified, columns considered. IS_values List Insertion Sites identifier. must list length N, hence observation value needed. specified, general identifier .1,....N generated.

title: Creates an object of class mvnmm. — fit
code: fit(   cov.df,   vaf.df,   k_interval = c(10, 30),   n_runs = 3,   steps = 500,   lr = 0.005,   p = 0.01,   convergence = TRUE,   covariance = "diag",   min_frac = 0,   random_state = 25 )

title: Creates an object of class mvnmm. — fit
text: cov.df Input coverage dataset. must least columns coverage, timepoints, lineage, , coverage values, timepoint, lineage , respectively. vaf.df Input VAF dataset. must least columns alt, dp, vaf, timepoints, lineage, , mutation, number reads mutated allele, overall depth, vaf values, timepoint, lineage, mutation, respectively. k_interval Interval K values test. n_runs Number runs perform K. steps Maximum number steps inference. lr Learning rate used inference. covariance Covariance type Multivariate Gaussian. random_state Value seed.

title: Creates an object of class mvnmm. — fit
text: mvnmm object, containing input dataset, annotated IS_values, N, K, T specific dataset, input column names, list params contain inferred parameters, python object

text: x mvnmm object. string among "frac","pop","fitness" determining whether plot coverage normalized [0,1], absolute clone abundance, clone colored growth rate, computed assuming exponential growth. highlight vector clusters IDs highlight plot. min_frac min_frac numeric value [0,1] representing minimum abundance highlight clone. legend.pos position legend. set "none", legend shown. wrap Boolean. set TRUE, single plot mullerplots lineage returned.
